long_description: This kit for your Yakima Q-rack provides extra crossbar spread, creating more stability for carrying longer loads. Telescoping stretch kit positions rear Q-Towers farther back on some 2-door cars. The Q Stretch Kit can only be secured to Q Towers, and works only with recommended Q Tower applications; to see if you need the kit, check the Yakima Fit List.
short_description: This kit for your Yakima Q-rack provides extra crossbar spread, creating more stability for carrying longer loads.
